name: Windows Gadget
summary: A GADGET file is a small program that runs within the Windows Vista or Windows 7 sidebar. It stores several web-based files in a Zip archive format and may include .HTML , .CSS , .JS files, as well as other web files. GADGET files are used for small programs such as news feeds, search tools, system utilities, and small games.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Microsoft Windows (only Windows 7 and Windows Vista)
